title: their jungler was only 1-13 but it doesnt matter
body: when all 3 lanes get trashed on.  Can we make the game if you are better than your opponent you win more often? Not herp derp who gets the worse players?

replies.body:
> Can we make the game if you are better than your opponent you win more often? Not herp derp who gets the worse players?

Isn't this the same thing? The enemy team was better than your team because yours had worse players, so they won?

Or does it only count if you're the one winning?

Well i mean people ONLY make the complaint when they're losing.

Won't even cross a person's mind when they're winning so.
